Navigation
Name Rascal/Libraries/Vis/Figure/Properties/project
Synopsis Project figure on a hscreen or vscreen.
Function FProperty project (Figure f0, str p0)
Description Project figure f0 from this figure onto the screen with id p0. See hscreen and vscreen
